testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDeviceInformationSubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.2.2 [Need to Share Updated CCTV Device Inventory] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Publish CCTV Inventory Information (NTRM 3.3.5.3.1.2}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N26R509_Publish_CCTV_Inventory_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N26R509_Publish_CCTV_Inventory_Information_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Subscribe to CCTV Inventory Information (NTRM 3.3.5.3.1.3}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N26R510_Subscribe_to_CCTV_Inventory_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N26R510_Subscribe_to_CCTV_Inventory_Information_Parameter}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R377_Device_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R377_Device_Description_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Control Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Controller Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R379_Controller_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R379_Controller_Description_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Direction - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Version is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Uniform Resource Locator (URL) (DeviceURL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported = ${TMDD_N26R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device URL Reference Medium is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Text Insertion - CCTV Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R514_Text_Insertion___CCTV_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R514_Text_Insertion___CCTV_Inventory_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R515_Camera_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R515_Camera_Type_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Pan Left Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R516_Camera_Pan_Left_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R516_Camera_Pan_Left_Limit_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Pan Right Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R517_Camera_Pan_Right_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R517_Camera_Pan_Right_Limit_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Tilt Up Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R518_Camera_Tilt_Up_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R518_Camera_Tilt_Up_Limit_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Tilt Down Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R519_Camera_Tilt_Down_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R519_Camera_Tilt_Down_Limit_Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Zoom Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R520_Camera_Zoom_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R520_Camera_Zoom_Limit_Supported}

Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Focus Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R521_Camera_Focus_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R521_Camera_Focus_Limit_Supported}

Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Iris Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R522_Camera_Iris_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R522_Camera_Iris_Limit_Supported}

Step 30 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Environmental Features is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N26R523_Camera_Environmental_Features_Supported = ${TMDD_N26R523_Camera_Environmental_Features_Supported}
Step 31 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 32 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 33 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 34 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 35 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 36 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 37 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 38 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 39 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 40 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDeviceInformationSubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 41 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 41.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note:If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 41.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlCCTVInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N26R509_Publish_CCTV_Inventory_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 41.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 41.1.2.1 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.3 VERIFY that a device-id data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.4 VERIFY that a device-location data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.5 VERIFY that a device-name data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.6 VERIFY that a cCTVInventoryMsg message was received.
Step 41.1.2.7 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.8 VERIFY that a cctv-requests-supported-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.9 VERIFY that a cctv-image-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.10 IF TMDD_N26R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.10.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.11 IF TMDD_N26R377_Device_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.11.1 VERIFY that a device-description data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.12 IF TMDD_N26R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.12.1 VERIFY that a device-control-type data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.13 IF TMDD_N26R379_Controller_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.13.1 VERIFY that a controller-description data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.14 IF TMDD_N26R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.14.1 VERIFY that a network-id data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.15 IF TMDD_N26R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.15.1 VERIFY that a node-id data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.16 IF TMDD_N26R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.16.1 VERIFY that a node-name data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.17 IF TMDD_N26R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.17.1 VERIFY that a link-id data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.18 IF TMDD_N26R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.18.1 VERIFY that a link-name data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.19 IF TMDD_N26R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.19.1 VERIFY that a link-direction data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.20 IF TMDD_N26R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.20.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.21 IF TMDD_N26R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.21.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference-version data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.22 IF TMDD_N26R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.22.1 VERIFY that a route-designator data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.23 IF TMDD_N26R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.23.1 VERIFY that a device-url data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.24 IF TMDD_N26R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.24.1 VERIFY that an url-reference-medium data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header.device-url
Step 41.1.2.25 IF TMDD_N26R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.25.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.26 IF TMDD_N26R514_Text_Insertion___CCTV_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.26.1 VERIFY that a cctv-titling-text data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.27 IF TMDD_N26R515_Camera_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.27.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-type data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.28 IF TMDD_N26R516_Camera_Pan_Left_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.28.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-pan-left-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.29 IF TMDD_N26R517_Camera_Pan_Right_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.29.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-pan-right-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.30 IF TMDD_N26R518_Camera_Tilt_Up_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.30.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-tilt-up-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.31 IF TMDD_N26R519_Camera_Tilt_Down_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.31.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-tilt-down-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.32 IF TMDD_N26R520_Camera_Zoom_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.32.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-zoom-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.33 IF TMDD_N26R521_Camera_Focus_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.33.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-focus-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.34 IF TMDD_N26R522_Camera_Iris_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.34.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-iris-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.35 IF TMDD_N26R523_Camera_Environmental_Features_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.35.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-environmental data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.36 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 41.1.2.37 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 41.1.2.38 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlCCTVInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N26R509_Publish_CCTV_Inventory_Information_Parameter CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage

Step 42 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 42.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 42.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 42.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 42.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 42.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 42.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to SubscriptionErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 42.7 IF TMDD_N26R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 43 EXIT
